algorithm_technique: Combinatorial approach to count contributions of each element to consecutive subarrays.
problem_summary_simple: Sum the values of all consecutive subarrays (increasing or decreasing by 1) within a given array.
problem_summary_technical: Calculates contributions of elements to consecutive subarrays using a helper function that counts subarrays with a specific difference.
key_insights: The problem can be solved by considering the contribution of each element to all consecutive subarrays it belongs to.
A key insight is that the sum of all consecutive subarrays can be decomposed into sums of increasing and decreasing sequences.
The formula for the sum of an arithmetic progression is used implicitly in the counting logic.
